languages.text: Этот персонаж использует рукопашное оружие — чтобы атаковать в ближнем бою, он должен находиться на соседней с врагом клетке. Чтобы совершить атаку, выберите {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Удар с помощью {console_bind|DPadHorizontal} и подтвердите выбор {console_bind|Confirm}. Затем выделите противника, которого хотите атаковать, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. В отличие от одиночного выстрела, атака в рукопашном бою {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадает{/g} по противнику автоматически, без броска на попадание. Противник попытается {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаку, если также использует рукопашное оружие. Рукопашным оружием можно совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} — все существа в зоне ее действия получат {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, если не пройдут {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} уклонения (и парирования, если они также используют рукопашное оружие). Урон от атаки рукопашным оружием зависит от параметров оружия и показателя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} атакующего.

traits.locale_text:
Этот персонаж использует рукопашное оружие — чтобы атаковать в ближнем бою, он должен находиться на соседней с врагом клетке. Чтобы совершить атаку, выберите способность Удар с помощью {console_bind|DPadX} и подтвердите выбор {console_bind|Confirm}. Затем выделите противника, которого хотите атаковать, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. В отличие от одиночного выстрела, атака в рукопашном бою попадает по противнику автоматически, без броска на попадание. Но противник может уклониться или парировать атаку, если также использует рукопашное оружие.
Рукопашным оружием можно совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} — все существа в зоне ее действия получат урон, если не пройдут проверку {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} (и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g}, если они также используют рукопашное оружие). Урон от атаки рукопашным оружием зависит от параметров оружия и показателя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} атакующего.

languages.text:
This character is using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}, and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.
languages.original_text: Этот персонаж использует рукопашное оружие — чтобы атаковать в ближнем бою, он должен находиться на соседней с врагом клетке. Чтобы совершить атаку, выберите {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Удар с помощью {console_bind|DPadHorizontal} и подтвердите выбор {console_bind|Confirm}. Затем выделите противника, которого хотите атаковать, и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}. В отличие от одиночного выстрела, атака в рукопашном бою {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадает{/g} по противнику автоматически, без броска на попадание. Противник попытается {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклониться{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировать{/g} атаку, если также использует рукопашное оружие. Рукопашным оружием можно совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} — все существа в зоне ее действия получат {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, если не пройдут {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} уклонения (и парирования, если они также используют рукопашное оружие). Урон от атаки рукопашным оружием зависит от параметров оружия и показателя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} атакующего.

traits.locale_text: This character is using a melee weapon. Melee attacks require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the strike ability using {console_bind|DPadX} and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike single shots, melee attacks hit automatically with no need for a roll. However, the enemy can still dodge the attack, and they can also parry it if they are using a melee weapon of their own. Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} test (or a {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

This character is using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the Strike {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}, and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own. Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

This character is using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the strike {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}, and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and parry the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own. Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

This character is using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the Strike {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}, and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own. Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

languages.text:
Este personaje utiliza un arma {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}. Los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} precisan que el personaje se sitúe al lado del enemigo. Para ejecutar un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, elige la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Golpe{/g} con {console_bind|DPadHorizontal} y confirma tu decisión con {console_bind|Confirm}. A continuación, elige al enemigo que quieras atacar y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. A diferencia de los ataques de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g}, los de cuerpo a cuerpo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactan{/g} automáticamente sin necesidad de superar una prueba. El enemigo intentará {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} el ataque y, si también usa un arma cuerpo a cuerpo, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararlo{/g}.
Las armas cuerpo a cuerpo también pueden lanzar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Con esta clase de ataques, todos los seres que se encuentren dentro del área sufrirán {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} a menos que superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de esquiva (o una prueba de parada si llevan un arma cuerpo a cuerpo). El daño que ejercen las armas cuerpo a cuerpo viene dado por los parámetros del arma y la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} del atacante.
languages.original_text:
This character is using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}, and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: Este personaje utiliza un arma cuerpo a cuerpo. Los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} precisan que el personaje se sitúe al lado del enemigo. Para ejecutar un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, elige la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de golpe con {console_bind|DPadX} y confirma tu decisión con {console_bind|Confirm}. A continuación, elige al enemigo que quieras atacar y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm}. A diferencia de los {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataques de un solo disparo{/g}, los de cuerpo a cuerpo {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactan{/g} automáticamente sin necesidad de superar una prueba. Sin embargo, el enemigo siempre podrá {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} el ataque e, incluso, pararlo si lleva su propia arma cuerpo a cuerpo. Las armas cuerpo a cuerpo también pueden lanzar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Con esta clase de ataques, todos los seres que se encuentren dentro del área sufrirán daño a menos que superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} (o una prueba de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} si llevan un arma cuerpo a cuerpo). El daño que ejercen las armas cuerpo a cuerpo viene dado por los parámetros del arma y la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}fuerza{/g} del atacante.

languages.text: このキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接{/g}武器を使用している。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}を実行するには、キャラクターが敵に隣接している必要がある。近接攻撃を実行するには、{console_bind|DPadHorizontal}で攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を選び、{console_bind|Confirm}で確定する。次に攻撃したい敵を選び、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}とは異なり、近接攻撃は判定なしに自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する。ただし敵はその攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}することができ、近接武器を持っていた場合は{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}こともできる。 近接武器は{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に使用できる。範囲内のすべての生物は、回避{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}（または近接武器を装備している場合は受け流し判定）に成功しない限り{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。近接武器によるダメージは、武器のパラメータと攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}によって決まる。
languages.original_text: This character is using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the Strike {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}, and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own. Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターは近接武器を使用している。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}を実行するには、キャラクターが敵に隣接している必要がある。近接攻撃を実行するには、{console_bind|DPadX}で攻撃 {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を選び、{console_bind|Confirm}で確定する。次に攻撃したい敵を選び、{console_bind|Confirm}を押す。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}とは異なり、近接攻撃はロールなしに自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}する。ただし、敵はその攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避することができ{/g}、近接武器を使っていた場合は、受け流すこともできる。 近接武器は{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に使用できる。範囲内のすべての生き物は、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}テスト{/g}（または近接武器を装備している場合は {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}テスト）に合格しない限り、ダメージを受ける。近接武器が与えるダメージは、武器のパラメータと攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}強度{/g}スコアによって異なる。

languages.text:
此角色正在使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战{/g}武器，{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}只能攻击邻近的敌人。若要进行近战攻击，请通过{console_bind|DPadHorizontal}选择{g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}打击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，之后通过{console_bind|Confirm}确认您的选择，之后选择您想要攻击的敌人，按下{console_bind|Confirm}。近战攻击与{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}不同，它会默认{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人，无需掷骰。目标敌人会尝试{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}此次攻击，如果该敌人同样手持近战武器，则会尝试使用武器{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击。
近战武器可以发动{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，影响范围内的所有生物都需要进行闪避{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，所有检定失败的生物都会受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}（如果受影响的生物使用的是近战武器，还可以进行招架检定）。近战武器造成的伤害，取决于武器本身的属性与攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}属性。
languages.original_text:
This character is using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}, and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: 此名角色使用的是近战武器。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}必须邻近敌人才能发动。若要发动近战攻击，按下{console_bind|DPadX}来选择打击{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}确认。之后选择要攻击的敌人，按下{console_bind|Confirm}。与{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}不同，近战攻击无需掷骰，会默认自动{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}敌人。不过，敌人依然可能会{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}攻击，如果敌人同样使用近战武器，还可能会尝试招架攻击。 近战武器可以发动{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，影响范围内的所有生物都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，所有检定失败的生物都会受到伤害（如果受影响的生物使用的是近战武器，还可以进行{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}检定）。近战武器造成的伤害，取决于武器的属性以及攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}属性。

languages.text:
Dieser Charakter benutzt eine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampf{/g}-Waffe. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} setzen voraus, dass sich der Charakter neben dem Feind befindet. Um einen Nahkampfangriff durchzuführen, wähle die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Hieb{/g} mit {console_bind|DPadHorizontal} und bestätige deine Wahl mit {console_bind|Confirm}. Wähle dann den Feind, den du angreifen willst, und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Im Gegensatz zu {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschüssen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}treffen{/g} Nahkampfangriffe automatisch, ohne dass ein Würfelwurf nötig ist. Nutzt der Feind selbst eine Nahkampfwaffe, wird er versuchen, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}auszuweichen{/g} und ihn zu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}.
Nahkampfwaffen können für {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} verwendet werden: Alle Kreaturen in diesem Bereich erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, es sei denn, sie schaffen eine Ausweich-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} (oder eine Parade-Probe, wenn sie mit einer Nahkampfwaffe bewaffnet sind). Der von Nahkampfwaffen verursachte Schaden hängt von den Waffenparametern und dem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}-Wert des Angreifers ab.
languages.original_text:
This character is using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}, and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Charakter benutzt eine Nahkampfwaffe. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} setzen voraus, dass sich der Charakter neben dem Gegner befindet. Um einen Nahkampfangriff durchzuführen, wähle die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Hieb mit {console_bind|DPadX} und bestätige deine Wahl mit {console_bind|Confirm}. Wähle dann den Gegner, den du angreifen willst, und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}. Im Gegensatz zu {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschüssen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g} Nahkampfangriffe automatisch, ohne dass ein Würfelwurf nötig ist. Der Gegner kann dem Angriff jedoch immer noch {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g} und ihn auch parieren, wenn er selbst eine Nahkampfwaffe benutzt. Nahkampfwaffen können für {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} verwendet werden: Alle Kreaturen in diesem Bereich erleiden Schaden, es sei denn, sie schaffen eine {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweich-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} (oder eine {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g}-Probe, wenn sie mit einer Nahkampfwaffe bewaffnet sind). Der von Nahkampfwaffen verursachte Schaden hängt von den Waffenparametern und dem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärkewert{/g} des Angreifers ab.

languages.text:
Ce personnage utilise une arme de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} impliquent que le personnage soit adjacent à l'ennemi. Pour lancer une attaque de mêlée, choisissez la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Frappe{/g} avec {console_bind|DPadHorizontal} et confirmez votre choix avec {console_bind|Confirm}. Choisissez ensuite l'ennemi que vous souhaitez attaquer et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Contrairement aux {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tirs au coup par coup{/g}, les attaques de mêlée {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchent{/g} automatiquement sans qu'il soit nécessaire d'effectuer un jet de dés. L'ennemi peut toujours tenter d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} l'attaque ou de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} s'il utilise une arme de mêlée.
Les armes de mêlée peuvent être utilisées pour lancer des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} ; toutes les créatures de la zone subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à moins de réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'esquive (ou un test de parade si elles sont équipées d'une arme de mêlée). Les dégâts infligés par les armes de mêlée dépendent de leurs paramètres et du score de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de l'attaquant.
languages.original_text:
This character is using a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee{/g} weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, choose the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, using {console_bind|DPadHorizontal}, and confirm your choice with {console_bind|Confirm}. Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: Ce personnage utilise une arme de mêlée. Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} impliquent que le personnage soit adjacent à l'ennemi. Pour effectuer une attaque de mêlée, choisissez la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de frappe à l’aide de {console_bind|DPadX} et confirmez votre choix à l’aide de {console_bind|Confirm}. Choisissez ensuite l'ennemi que vous souhaitez attaquer et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm}. Contrairement aux {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}tirs au coup par coup{/g}, les attaques de mêlée {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}infligent des coups{/g} automatiquement sans qu'il soit nécessaire d'effectuer un jet de dés. Mais l'ennemi peut toujours {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g} l'attaque et la parer s'il utilise une arme de mêlée. Les armes de mêlée peuvent être utilisées pour effectuer des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} ; toutes les créatures de la zone subissent des dégâts à moins de réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d’{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g}(ou un test de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} si elles sont équipées d'une arme de mêlée). Les dégâts infligés par les armes de mêlée dépendent de leurs paramètres et du score de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de l'attaquant.

languages.text:
Bu karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} silahı kullanıyor. Karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} yapabilmesi için düşmana bitişik hücrede olması gerekir. Yakın dövüş saldırısı yapmak için, {console_bind|DPadHorizontal} ile {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Atak{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} seç ve {console_bind|Confirm} ile seçimini onayla. Sonra saldırmak istediğin düşmanı seçip {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine bas. Yakın dövüş saldırıları, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atışların{/g} aksine zar atmaya gerek olmaksızın otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g}. Düşman da yakın dövüş silahı kullanıyorsa saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınmaya{/g} veya saldırıyı {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturmaya{/g} çalışacaktır.
Yakın dövüş silahları, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g} yapmak için kullanılabilir. Alandaki tüm yaratıklar, kaçınma {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} (veya yakın dövüş silahı kullanıyorlarsa savuşturma testine) girer ve başarısız olurlarsa {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} maruz kalırlar. Yakın dövüş silahlarının verdiği hasar düzeyi, silahın parametrelerine ve saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} değerine bağlıdır.

Then choose the enemy you wish to attack and press {console_bind|Confirm}. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.
